Apr 11

Turkish Startup Ecosystem Stakeholders

As Startups.watch we offer data and insight to investors and business development specialists of corporations. We have prepared a rough list for those who have questions about the Turkish Startup Ecosystem from abroad. If you need more data and insights, you can subscribe the startups.watch. (We publish weekly vertical reports, funding reports)

Accelerators

(All active programs with with dedicated education programs and demo day)

  • Atom
  • BIC101
  • Bioizmir
  • CAP
  • Embryonix
  • Etohum
  • Founder Institute
  • Game Garage
  • GarantiPartners
  • Girişim Fabrikası
  • Gemim
  • Hackquarters
  • InnoCampus
  • Inovent
  • İTÜ Çekirdek
  • İTÜ Gate
  • iNEO
  • KWORKS
  • nüvEGE
  • StartersHub XO
  • Startupbootcamp Istanbul
  • SUCool
  • TEB Fintech Future Four
  • TEB Girişim Evi
  • Teknoloji Türkiye
  • T-Jump
  • TeknoGirişim Okulu
  • Türk Telekom Pilot
  • Viveka
  • WAY Turkey
  • Yfyi
